description:
Santana is a 21-year-old Brazilian-Puerto Rican mix.
He's got curly dark hair, big bold blue eyes that are right out of a Manga comic, and a sparkling smile, all tightly packaged in a 5 foot 6 frame.
Let's face it, with his baby doll eyes, he is just dang adorable and I think the girls fall for his innocent looks.
But then he lures them on over to the dark side for lots of naughty fun!
Santana is a sexual boy who is always looking for some action, and is eager to show off his dick.
The video is pretty dang hot, and it is complete with the sound of thunder as a storm passes while shooting.
He seems to be down with doing more than a solo, but he doesn't really know what more he wants to do. I of course am gonna try to hook him up for some oral action, but we'll see if he can be eased into guy-on-guy sex.
Stay tuned!
title: Santana - Solo
